variable.name: CASE_STATUS
variable.description: Cases are defined as: Subjects meeting EMR criteria (5 dementia dx or 1 rx) from VU, Marshfield and Mayo cohorts OR Subjects enrolled in Group Health's ADPR (which required probable presence of Alzheimer's disease at study enrollment) OR Subjects

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems; no distribution to insurance companies (HR_MC).
May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems (HR_VU).
These data will be used only for health related research, including research to improve methods for health related research (HR_GHS).

Limited to health research on dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. This includes research to improve methods for conducting research that could be applied to dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. For
